verses.verse: Paul, <S%G3972><s%> an apostle <S%G652><s%> (not [sent] from men, <S%G444><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the agency <S%G1223><s%> of man, <S%G444><s%> but through <S%G1223><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> and God <S%G2316><s%> the Father, <S%G3962><s%> who raised <S%G1453><s%> Him from the dead <S%G3498><s%>),
and all <S%G3956><s%> the brethren <S%G80><s%> who are with me, to the churches <S%G1577><s%> of Galatia: <S%G1053><s%>
Grace <S%G5485><s%> to you and peace <S%G1515><s%> from God <S%G2316><s%> our Father, <S%G3962><s%> and the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%>

who gave <S%G1325><s%> Himself <S%G1438><s%> for our sins, <S%G266><s%> that He might deliver <S%G1807><s%> us out of this <S%G3588><s%> present <S%G1764><s%> evil <S%G4190><s%> age, <S%G165><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the will <S%G2307><s%> of our God <S%G2316><s%> and Father, <S%G3962><s%>
to whom <S%G3739><s%> [be] the glory <S%G1391><s%> forevermore. <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>

I am <S%G2296><s%> amazed <S%G2296><s%> that you are so <S%G3779><s%> quickly <S%G5030><s%> deserting <S%G3346><s%> <S%G575><s%> Him who called <S%G2564><s%> you by the grace <S%G5485><s%> of Christ, <S%G5547><s%> for a different <S%G2087><s%> gospel; <S%G2098><s%>

which <S%G3739><s%> is [really] not another; <S%G243><s%> only <S%G1487><s%> <S%G3361><s%> there are some <S%G5100><s%> who are disturbing <S%G5015><s%> you, and want <S%G2309><s%> to distort <S%G3344><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

But even <S%G2532><s%> though <S%G1437><s%> we, or <S%G2228><s%> an angel <S%G32><s%> from heaven, <S%G3772><s%> should preach <S%G2097><s%> to you a gospel <S%G2097><s%> contrary <S%G3844><s%> to that which <S%G3739><s%> we have preached <S%G2097><s%> to you, let him be accursed. <S%G331><s%>

As we have said <S%G4275><s%> before, <S%G4275><s%> so <S%G2532><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> now, <S%G737><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man <S%G5100><s%> is preaching <S%G2097><s%> to you a gospel <S%G2097><s%> contrary <S%G3844><s%> to that which <S%G3739><s%> you received, <S%G3880><s%> let him be accursed. <S%G331><s%>

For am I now <S%G737><s%> seeking <S%G3982><s%> the favor <S%G3982><s%> of men, <S%G444><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>? Or <S%G2228><s%> am I striving <S%G2212><s%> to please <S%G700><s%> men <S%G444><s%>? If <S%G1487><s%> I were still <S%G2089><s%> trying to please <S%G700><s%> men, <S%G444><s%> I would not be a bond-servant of Christ. <S%G5547><s%>
For I would have <S%G1107><s%> you know, <S%G1107><s%> brethren, <S%G80><s%> that the gospel <S%G2098><s%> which was preached <S%G2097><s%> by me is not according <S%G2596><s%> to man. <S%G444><s%>

For I neither <S%G3761><s%> received <S%G3880><s%> it from man, <S%G444><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> was I taught <S%G1321><s%> it, but [I received it] through <S%G1223><s%> a revelation <S%G602><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

For you have heard <S%G191><s%> of my former <S%G4218><s%> manner <S%G391><s%> of life <S%G391><s%> in Judaism, <S%G2454><s%> how <S%G3754><s%> I used to persecute <S%G1377><s%> the church <S%G1577><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> beyond <S%G2596><s%> <S%G5236><s%> measure, <S%G5236><s%> and tried to destroy <S%G4199><s%> it;

and I was advancing <S%G4298><s%> in Judaism <S%G2454><s%> beyond <S%G5228><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> of my contemporaries <S%G4915><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> my countrymen, <S%G1085><s%> being <S%G5225><s%> more <S%G4053><s%> extremely <S%G4053><s%> zealous <S%G2207><s%> for my ancestral <S%G3967><s%> traditions. <S%G3862><s%>

But when <S%G3753><s%> He who had set <S%G873><s%> me apart, <S%G873><s%> [even] from my mother's womb, <S%G2836><s%> and called <S%G2564><s%> me through <S%G1223><s%> His grace, <S%G5485><s%> was pleased <S%G2106><s%>

to reveal <S%G601><s%> His Son <S%G5207><s%> in me, that I might preach <S%G2097><s%> Him among <S%G1722><s%> the Gentiles, <S%G1484><s%> I did not immediately <S%G2112><s%> consult <S%G4323><s%> with flesh <S%G4561><s%> and blood, <S%G129><s%>

nor <S%G3761><s%> did I go <S%G424><s%> up to Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> to those <S%G3588><s%> who were apostles <S%G652><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> me; but I went <S%G565><s%> away <S%G565><s%> to Arabia, <S%G688><s%> and returned <S%G5290><s%> once <S%G3825><s%> more <S%G3825><s%> to Damascus. <S%G1154><s%>

Then <S%G1899><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> later <S%G3326><s%> I went <S%G424><s%> up to Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> to become <S%G2477><s%> acquainted <S%G2477><s%> with Cephas, <S%G2786><s%> and stayed <S%G1961><s%> with him fifteen <S%G1178><s%> days. <S%G2250><s%>
But I did not see <S%G3708><s%> any <S%G2087><s%> other <S%G2087><s%> of the apostles <S%G652><s%> except <S%G1508><s%> James, <S%G2385><s%> the Lord's brother. <S%G80><s%>
(Now <S%G1161><s%> in what <S%G3739><s%> I am writing <S%G1125><s%> to you, I assure <S%G2400><s%> you before <S%G1799><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> that I am not lying. <S%G5574><s%>)
Then <S%G1899><s%> I went <S%G2064><s%> into the regions <S%G2824><s%> of Syria <S%G4947><s%> and Cilicia. <S%G2791><s%>
And I was [still] unknown <S%G50><s%> by sight <S%G4383><s%> to the churches <S%G1577><s%> of Judea <S%G2453><s%> which were in Christ; <S%G5547><s%>

but only, <S%G3440><s%> they kept hearing, <S%G191><s%> "He who once <S%G4218><s%> persecuted <S%G1377><s%> us is now <S%G3568><s%> preaching <S%G2097><s%> the faith <S%G4102><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he once <S%G4218><s%> tried to destroy. <S%G4199><s%>"
And they were glorifying <S%G1392><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> because <S%G1722><s%> of me.
